Code Documentation¶

Views¶

Views used to render OAI-PMH response XML.

class django_oaipmh.views.OAIProvider(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
delegate(verb)[source]¶

Determine the verb, add it to the context and pass to the appropriate handler.

dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Call get() or post() & handle errors with error().

get(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Parse GET parameters and send them to delegate().

post(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Parse POST parameters and send them to delegate().

validate_config()[source]¶

Check that the provider configuration is valid.
